verbs.description: After [V: disinviting] [ARG1: the Philadelphia Eagles] [ARG2: from their White House visit] [ARGM-CAU: because so few players were expected to attend] , a new statement from Trump attempts to shift blame for the cancellation onto the team .

After disinviting the Philadelphia Eagles from their White House visit because so few players [V: were] expected to attend , a new statement from Trump attempts to shift blame for the cancellation onto the team .

After disinviting the Philadelphia Eagles from their White House visit because so few players were [V: expected] [ARG1: to attend] , a new statement from Trump attempts to shift blame for the cancellation onto the team .

After disinviting the Philadelphia Eagles from their White House visit because [ARG0: so few players] were expected to [V: attend] , a new statement from Trump attempts to shift blame for the cancellation onto the team .

After disinviting the Philadelphia Eagles from their White House visit because so few players were expected to attend , [ARG0: a new statement from Trump] attempts to [V: shift] [ARG1: blame for the cancellation] [ARG2: onto the team] .
